Articles.Content:
Attempting to fix to issues with Lonesome robots awesome DADV iva in 12.5 . I'm currently trying to using it with Astros MADV part mod. Patched over the IVA the from LonesomeRobots collection to both parts. 

But im currently having issues with the windows being opaque and not see through in IVA regardless of which part i use. Is this a texture issue? Do I need to learn to use unity/blender  or can I fix it in the spaces cfg? 

Also im having issues with Free IVA as well. Mainly the Lab and Hab hatches not aligning.  I'm guessing i need to play with cgf  hatch location or rotation to make them line up? 

The final issue is making the top docking port node work with free iva. When I place a docking port, it blocks the top hatch  with unpassable door with a backward message.  With slim profile ports, I can see open the top hatch, but after that it's still blocked. 

 

Thank you guys for any help  or advice you can give. 

Edited May 30 by mozzy
